doc:
Roger Allam https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Allam 0 Roger William Allam (born 26 October 1953) is an English actor, known primarily for his stage career, although he has performed in film, television and radio. He played Inspector Javert in the original London production of the stage musical Les Misérables, First Officer Douglas Richardson in the award-winning radio series Cabin Pressure, and DI Fred Thursday in the TV series Endeavour. He is also known for his roles as Illyrio Mopatis in the HBO series Game of Thrones, Royalton in Speed Racer, Lewis Prothero in the 2005 adaptation of V for Vendetta and as Peter Mannion MP in The Thick Of It.
He has been nominated four times for the Laurence Olivier Award for Best Actor, winning twice. Roger_William_Allam ( born_26_October_1953 ) is an_English_actor , known primarily for his_stage_career , although he has_performed in film_,_television_and_radio . He played Inspector_Javert in the_original_London_production of the_stage musical_Les_Misérables , First_Officer_Douglas_Richardson in the_award-winning_radio_series_Cabin_Pressure , and DI_Fred_Thursday in the_TV_series_Endeavour . He is_also_known for his_roles as Illyrio_Mopatis in the_HBO_series_Game of Thrones , Royalton in Speed_Racer , Lewis_Prothero in the_2005_adaptation of V for Vendetta and as Peter_Mannion_MP in The_Thick Of It . He has_been_nominated four_times for the_Laurence_Olivier_Award for_Best_Actor , winning twice .
